description: The 20th anniversary of the sinking of the scallop dredger in Manx waters is marked.
title: Solway Harvester: Crewmen remembered on 20th anniversary of sinking
title_page: Solway Harvester: Crewmen remembered on 20th anniversary of sinking - BBC News
maintext: Mr Quayle said: "As a seafaring nation, we understood the heartache of those left behind and this tragedy has led to an enduring bond between the island and the men's hometowns."
